languages.text: {n}Ульфар слабо усмехается.{/n} "Да уж, никто не посмел бы сказать про Зловещий вой, что они взирают в глаза Моркаи без радостного трепета и пламени в сердце".
{n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар слабо усмехается.{/n} "Да уж, никто не посмел бы сказать про Зловещий вой, что они взирают в глаза Моркаи без радостного трепета и пламени в сердце".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Famehungry would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Famehungry would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了力不从心的笑声。{/n}“确实如此，当怒嚎者盯着莫凯的双眼时，他们心中只有充满喜悦的敬畏，以及熊熊燃烧的烈焰。
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了力不从心的笑声。{/n}“确实如此，当渴名者盯着莫凯的双眼时，他们心中只有充满喜悦的敬畏，以及熊熊燃烧的烈焰。
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは不機嫌そうに力なく笑う。{/n}「確かにな。破滅の咆哮は、歓喜の畏れ以外何もなくモルカイの目をのぞき込んで己の心に火を灯した、なんて大それたことを言う奴はいないよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは不機嫌そうに力なく笑う。{/n}「確かにな。破滅の咆哮は、歓喜の畏れ以外何もなくモルカイの目をのぞき込んで己の心に火を灯した、なんて大それたことを言う奴はいないよ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar ríe débilmente.{/n} «Cierto. Nadie dirá que el Aullido Torvo mira a los ojos de Morkai con nada menos que alegre asombro y fuego en los corazones».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar ríe débilmente.{/n} «Cierto. Nadie dirá que los Hambrientos de Fama miran a los ojos de Morkai con nada menos que alegre asombro y fuego en los corazones».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar pousse un petit rire sans entrain.{/n} « Bien dit. Personne ne pourra dire que les Hurleurs sanguinaires ont fait face à Morkaï autrement qu'avec une joyeuse admiration et un cœur ardent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar pousse un petit rire sans entrain.{/n} « Bien dit. Personne ne pourra dire que les Dévoreurs de gloire ont fait face à Morkaï autrement qu'avec une joyeuse admiration et un cœur ardent. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar stößt ein schwaches Lachen aus.{/n} "Wohl wahr. Niemand würde zu sagen wagen, dass die Baleful Howl Morkai mit etwas anderem als freudiger Ehrfurcht und Feuer im Herzen in die Augen starren."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar lacht schwach.{/n} "Wohl wahr. Niemand kann sagen, dass die Famehungry Morkai ohne freudige Ehrfurcht und Feuer im Herzen in die Augen blicken."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, zayıf bir gülüş atıyor.{/n} "Haklısın. Kimse Uğursuz Uluma'nın, Morkai'ın gözlerine neşeli bir dehşet ve yüreklerindeki ateşle bakmadığını söylemeye cesaret edemez."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar huffs a weak laugh.{/n} "True enough. No one would dare say that the Baleful Howl would stare into the eyes of Morkai with anything but joyful awe and fire in their hearts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar zayıf bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Haklısın. Kimse Uğursuz Uluma'nın, Morkai'ın gözlerine neşeli bir dehşet ve yüreklerindeki ateşle bakmadığını söylemeye cesaret edemez."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
